name: Chicken Panic
description:
After drinking too much grogs at the tavern, resulting in some ugly words towards the old gods, two crews of pirates received a nasty curse: random chickens now spawn from the sky directly in their ships!

Only one solution: getting rid of the chickens by shooting them on the other boat before it's too late. Which crew will be the last standing?

The Game

Chicken Panic! is a couch co-op and versus game where two teams of two players compete to be last crew standing by shooting chickens through cannons.

Key Features :

  • Intense versus and co-op gameplay.
  • Adjustable cannons allowing strategic choices.
  • Recipes system based on colours combinations.
  • Powerful magic abilities.
  • Special chickens with unique behaviours.
  • Funny hats to personalize your pirate.

We strongly recommend taking a look at the HOW TO PLAY section before launching a game.

Disclaimer: Chicken Panic! is balanced to be played by four players (2vs2). 

Support both controller and keyboard.
